about_the_game:
Welcome to the demo of "Ethereal Fracture," an exciting fantasy roguelike RPG that will take you through intertwined dimensions in a constantly changing universe!

In this demo you can play up to level 5/the first two worlds!

Immerse yourself in the action of this fractured world where every step you take is a new adventure. Explore randomly generated dungeons filled with challenging enemies, unexpected events, and tempting rewards. Get ready to face powerful bosses that will test your strategic skills!

Features

  • Explore randomly generated dungeons.

  • Visual duality: switch between old-school pixel and modern graphics.

  • Uncover the backstory of the world and its history as you play.

  • Customize your playstyle choosing equipment and items that unlock unique abilities and synergies.

Energy system!

With the energy system you can chain actions to make powerful combos. Each type of weapon has different energy costs. From daggers chaining small attacks, to axes with powerful attacks and a much greater energy expenditure.

Designed to add speed and depth to the turn-based combat!

Visual Style

The fracture in the game universe triggers a fascinating visual duality. Switch between two unique graphic styles: old-school pixel art and modern pixel art, immersing you in a world full of events.

Customize your gaming experience with a wide variety of equipment and items that alter your statistics, unlock special abilities, and allow you to discover powerful synergies. Each playthrough is an opportunity to experience new strategic approaches and discover unique combinations!

Are you ready to delve into this world of intertwined dimensions, unpredictable challenges, and mysteries to uncover? Join the adventure and unravel the secret of "Ethereal Fracture" today!

Discover the true meaning of the ethereal fracture and forge your destiny in "Ethereal Fracture"!

This game is a personal project developed by a single developer. Please feel free to contact me and share your comments, ideas and critiques – your opinion matters to me.
